name: Manajemen Bisnis
description: Program ini bertujuan untuk mengembangkan green manufacturing dengan pendekatan research pada PT Kalimaya Alunna Indonesia melalui inovasi produk olahan kurma. Program ini akan mempertimbangkan prinsip-prinsip lingkungan dalam proses produksi untuk meningkatkan efisiensi energi, mengurangi limbah, dan meminimalkan dampak negatif terhadap lingkungan. Salah satu fokus utama dari program ini adalah mengembangkan inovasi produk olahan kurma yang lebih ramah lingkungan. Hal ini dapat dicapai dengan memanfaatkan teknologi hijau dalam proses produksi, seperti penggunaan sumber energi terbarukan dan proses produksi yang lebih efisien. Selain itu, program ini juga akan mempertimbangkan penggunaan bahan baku yang ramah lingkungan dan berkelanjutan untuk produk olahan kurma. Selain mempertimbangkan aspek lingkungan, program ini juga akan mengejar peningkatan kualitas produk dan keunggulan kompetitif PT Kalimaya Alunna Indonesia di pasar domestik dan internasional. Melalui inovasi produk olahan kurma yang lebih baik, PT Kalimaya Alunna Indonesia dapat meningkatkan daya saingnya di pasar dan memperluas pangsa pasar di dalam dan luar negeri. Program ini juga akan melibatkan penelitian dan pengembangan dalam proses pengembangan inovasi produk olahan kurma yang ramah lingkungan dan berkualitas tinggi. Dengan memanfaatkan penelitian dan pengembangan, program ini diharapkan dapat menciptakan produk-produk olahan kurma yang inovatif, efektif, dan efisien serta dapat meningkatkan efektivitas produksi, daya saing, dan keuntungan bagi PT Kalimaya Alunna Indonesia.
skills: ['Manajemen Keuangan', 'Manajemen Hubungan Pelanggan', 'Manajemen Pemasaran', 'Manajemen Perkantoran', 'Business Development']

name: Pemasaran
description: Seorang Spesialis Pemasaran bertanggung jawab untuk merancang, melaksanakan, dan mengelola strategi pemasaran yang efektif untuk mendukung tujuan bisnis. Tugas utamanya melibatkan pemahaman mendalam tentang pasar, analisis tren konsumen, dan implementasi kampanye pemasaran yang sukses. Spesialis Pemasaran juga bekerja sama dengan berbagai departemen, termasuk penjualan, produksi, dan manajemen produk, untuk memastikan konsistensi pesan dan pencapaian target penjualan.

name: Influencer media sosial, konten kreator media sosial
description: membangun konten media sosial berupa digital flayer, video sebagai media promosi perusahaan. Melakukan branding di media sosial tentang program-program dan produk jasa CV. Hemispheres.
fields_of_study: ['Jurnalisme, Komunikasi, dan Media', 'Teknik Informatika dan Ilmu Komputer', 'Seni dan Desain']

name: Asisten Project Manager Inkubasi Bisnis
description: Perusahaan kami, Funvita Indonesia mencari seorang mahasiswa magang yang antusias dan bersemangat untuk bergabung dalam program magang pengembangan program baru dengan fokus pada inkubasi bisnis. Anda akan berperan dalam membantu tim pengembangan kami dalam merancang, mengembangkan, dan meluncurkan program inkubasi bisnis untuk produk atau layanan baru yang akan kami perkenalkan ke pasar. Magang ini akan memberikan Anda wawasan berharga tentang dunia pengembangan perangkat lunak, inkubasi bisnis, dan kolaborasi tim.Job Desk:• Mengidentifikasi keterampilan dan pengetahuan yang diperlukan oleh peserta inkubasi untuk sukses dalam penggunaan produk baru.• Mengumpulkan informasi dari berbagai sumber untuk menyusun materi pelatihan dan panduan inkubasi yang komprehensif.• Berkolaborasi dengan tim desain untuk mengembangkan materi visual yang menarik dan mendukung untuk program inkubasi.• Membantu dalam pengembangan platform atau alat yang diperlukan untuk pelaksanaan program inkubasi secara online atau tatap muka.• Berinteraksi dengan peserta inkubasi untuk memberikan panduan, menjawab pertanyaan, dan mengukur kemajuan mereka.• Mengumpulkan umpan balik dari peserta inkubasi dan melakukan perubahan yang diperlukan dalam program.• Membantu dalam mengatur dan melaksanakan sesi inkubasi, baik secara individu maupun kelompok.• Berpartisipasi dalam rapat tim untuk berbagi perkembangan, ide, dan tantangan yang dihadapi dalam pengembangan program

name: Grapich Desainer

name: Content Creator
description: Kami mencari mahasiswa berbakat yang ingin menjelajahi dunia konten kreatif. Magang ini merupakan kesempatan untuk membawa ide-ide segar Anda menjadi kenyataan, menghasilkan konten yang memikat dan bermakna untuk audiens yang luas.Sebagai Content Creator di SINTESIA, Anda akan memiliki kesempatan untuk:Pengembangan Konten: Berperan aktif dalam menciptakan konten-konten yang kreatif dan bermakna, mulai dari tulisan artikel, desain grafis, hingga produksi konten multimedia yang menginspirasi.Riset Mendalam: Melakukan riset yang teliti untuk memahami audiens dan tren terkini dalam industri konten kreatif guna menghasilkan konten yang relevan dan menarik.Kolaborasi Tim: Berpartisipasi dalam sesi brainstorming, berkolaborasi dengan tim kreatif, dan memberikan kontribusi pada strategi konten secara keseluruhan.Mengelola Jangkauan: Mempelajari praktik-praktik terbaik dalam pengelolaan dan optimisasi konten di berbagai platform, serta memantau kinerja konten untuk mencapai target jangkauan.Penggunaan Tools Kreatif: Menguasai dan memanfaatkan berbagai tools kreatif seperti perangkat lunak desain grafis, pengeditan video, dan platform manajemen konten.Keterampilan Komunikasi: Menulis dengan jelas dan persuasif, serta memiliki kemampuan komunikasi visual yang kuat untuk menghadirkan pesan yang menarik.Pemeliharaan Branding: Mendukung dan memperkuat konsistensi branding melalui konten yang dihasilkan.Belajar dan Berkembang: Memanfaatkan peluang magang sebagai waktu untuk belajar dan berkembang dalam industri konten kreatif, mendapatkan umpan balik, serta menerima mentorship dari para profesional berpengalaman."

name: Social Media Content Creator
description: Our Mission at PhotoSolve is to transform learning by helping every student succeed in school using the power of AI.PhotoSolve is an Indonesian fast-growing EdTech company, serving students worldwide. Powered by advanced machine learning technology, the app instantly scans, accurately solves, and intuitively explains printed and handwritten questions in any language.We are seeking a creative Social Media Content Manager to create video content for PhotoSolve’s social media presence on TikTok and Instagram Reels.The ideal candidate is highly creative and self-motivated, has excellent communication skills, and collaborates well with others.What you’ll do…Create entertaining, iconic content for PhotoSolve’s social media that people want to shareWork on crafting fun, educational content that helps further our mission of developing the best education in the world and making it accessibleConceptualize, script, produce, and shoot short-form video content for our social channels, primarily TikTok, Instagram Reels, and YouTubeEvolve our short-form video strategy with an eye towards quantitative analysis: run lots of content experiments and iterate on the ones that work.Internship Benefit...🧑‍💻 Opportunity to be a Part-Time Team with a Salary of Rp2–3 Million per Month.🌎 Online/Offline work flexibility (mainly online, flexible hours) with performance-based incentives.🌟 International Internship Certificate in dual languages (English & Indonesian) at the end of the internship period.📝 Full-Time Job Recommendation Letter & LinkedIn Recommendation.👥 Team bonding & relationship building (Networking).🌐 Access to a global network, enhancing your professional connections and industry exposure.What we’re looking for…Active College Students.Video production experience – you’re intimately familiar with in-app creator tools across social platforms and know your way around a video editing software like CapCut.In-tune with social trends, even before they hit; ability to respond ASAP to trends/memes to capitalize on those opportunitiesSolid interpersonal skills and passion for engaging with our social media communitiesProficient in both English and Indonesian.Please include a link to your portfolio / social media on the CV showcasing relevant work samples.

name: Legal Intern

Magang ini bertujuan untuk memberikan pemahaman mendalam tentang praktek hukum di industri kami.Tanggung Jawab Utama:Penelitian HukumPemantauan dan Analisis HukumPemilihan dan Penyusunan Dokumen HukumPartisipasi dalam Pertemuan HukumPemberian Saran HukumKerjasama TimPelaporan dan Dokumentasi

name: Fasilitator Kelas/Tenaga Pengajar
description: Bantuan dalam Pengajaran dan Pembelajaran: Mahasiswa akan merencanakan, menyusun, dan menyampaikan materi pembelajaran sesuai dengan pendekatan sekolah alam atau Montessori. Mereka akan terlibat dalam memfasilitasi kegiatan belajar siswa, seperti diskusi kelompok, eksperimen, atau proyek kreatif. Pengembangan Bahan Ajar: Mahasiswa akan terlibat dalam mengembangkan bahan ajar yang sesuai dengan prinsip-prinsip pendidikan alternatif, termasuk materi pelajaran, aktivitas pembelajaran, dan sumber daya pendukung lainnya. Mereka akan belajar untuk menyusun bahan ajar yang menarik dan sesuai dengan kebutuhan serta minat siswa. Pendampingan Siswa: Mahasiswa akan menjadi pendamping bagi siswa dalam proses belajar mereka. Mereka akan membantu siswa yang membutuhkan bantuan tambahan dalam memahami materi pelajaran, mendorong partisipasi aktif, dan memberikan dukungan emosional saat diperlukan.  Pelaksanaan Kegiatan Ekstrakurikuler: Mahasiswa akan membantu dalam menyelenggarakan kegiatan ekstrakurikuler yang mendukung pengembangan siswa secara holistik, seperti kegiatan seni, olahraga, atau lingkungan. Mereka akan berperan sebagai fasilitator atau pengawas untuk memastikan keberlangsungan dan keberhasilan kegiatan tersebut. Penilaian dan Umpan Balik: Mahasiswa akan terlibat dalam proses penilaian kinerja siswa, baik dalam bentuk pengamatan langsung maupun penilaian formatif. Mereka akan membantu dalam memberikan umpan balik konstruktif kepada siswa untuk membantu mereka meningkatkan prestasi akademik dan perilaku belajar.  Kolaborasi Tim: Mahasiswa akan bekerja sama dalam mengembangkan dan melaksanakan program-program pendidikan yang komprehensif. Mereka akan berpartisipasi dalam pertemuan tim, diskusi, dan perencanaan bersama untuk memastikan keterpaduan dan kesinambungan program.Pembelajaran Berkelanjutan: Selama magang, mahasiswa akan memiliki kesempatan untuk mengikuti pelatihan dan workshop yang diselenggarakan oleh sekolah atau lembaga pendidikan terkait untuk meningkatkan keterampilan mereka dalam mendukung proses pembelajaran dan pengajaran yang efektif.

name: Asisten Pengembangan Program Filantropi
description: Sebagai Asisten Pengembangan Program Filantropi, Anda akan terlibat dalam mendukung proses perencanaan, pengembangan, dan pelaksanaan program-program filantropi yang bertujuan untuk memperoleh dukungan keuangan dari berbagai pihak. Tugas Anda akan melibatkan kolaborasi dengan tim pengembangan, penyusunan proposal, riset program, dan berbagai kegiatan terkait untuk mencapai tujuan filantropi organisasi.Tanggung Jawab Utama:·   Penyusunan Proposal:·   Berkontribusi dalam penyusunan proposal-proposal filantropi untuk mendukung program-program organisasi.·   Memastikan proposal sesuai dengan pedoman dan kebutuhan pendanaan.·   Riset Program:·   Melakukan riset mendalam terkait isu-isu yang dihadapi oleh program-program filantropi.· …

name: Asisten Pengembangan Dana (Fundraising)
description: Sebagai Asisten Pengembangan Dana (Fundraising), Anda akan terlibat dalam mendukung kegiatan pengumpulan dana dan strategi pengembangan sumber-sumber pendanaan organisasi. Tugas Anda melibatkan berbagai kegiatan yang mendukung pencapaian target keuangan organisasi melalui kampanye penggalangan dana, kerjasama dengan donor, dan strategi pengembangan dana lainnya.Tanggung Jawab Utama:·   Pengembangan Kampanye Penggalangan Dana:·   Mendukung perencanaan dan pelaksanaan kampanye penggalangan dana organisasi.·   Berkontribusi dalam pengembangan strategi dan materi promosi kampanye.·   Kerjasama dengan Donor:·   Membantu dalam menjaga hubungan dengan donor dan memastikan komunikasi yang efektif.·   Mengelola panggilan atau komunikasi tertulis dengan donor potensial.·   Penyusunan Materi Promosi:·   Mendukung dalam penyusunan materi presentasi, brosur, dan materi promosi lainnya untuk mendukung kegiatan penggalangan dana.·   Riset Potensial Donor:·   Melakukan riset untuk mengidentifikasi dan mengevaluasi potensial donor baru.·   Mengumpulkan informasi yang relevan untuk menyusun pendekatan yang efektif.·   Partisipasi dalam Acara Penggalangan Dana:·   Terlibat dalam perencanaan dan pelaksanaan acara penggalangan dana, termasuk gala dinner, auksi, dan kegiatan lainnya.·   Administrasi Penggalangan Dana:·   Memberikan dukungan administratif dalam pelaksanaan kampanye, termasuk manajemen data donor, pengelolaan formulir donasi, dan kegiatan administratif lainnya.·   Koordinasi dengan Tim Pengembangan Dana:·   Berkolaborasi dengan anggota tim pengembangan dana untuk memastikan sinergi dan koordinasi yang baik dalam mencapai target penggalangan dana.·   Pelaporan Keuangan Penggalangan Dana:·   Membantu dalam penyusunan laporan keuangan berkaitan dengan kegiatan penggalangan dana.·   Memantau dan melaporkan progres terhadap target penggalangan dana.·   Pelatihan dan Pengembangan:·   Terlibat dalam pelatihan dan pengembangan terkait teknik penggalangan dana dan kebijakan-kebijakan terkini.·   Pemahaman Kebijakan Penggalangan Dana:·   Mempahami dan mematuhi kebijakan-kebijakan terkait etika dan keberlanjutan dalam penggalangan dana.Melalui peran ini, Anda akan memperoleh pengalaman praktis dalam dunia fundraising dan pengembangan dana, serta dapat berkontribusi pada pencapaian target keuangan organisasi.

name: HUKUM BISNIS
description: Program magang ini ditujukan untuk para mahasiswa jurusan hukum yang tertarik untuk mendapatkan pengalaman praktik langsung di bidang hukum bisnis, khususnya dalam konteks Usaha Mikro, Kecil, dan Menengah (UMKM) yang berfokus pada produk kelapa jelly. Magang ini merupakan kesempatan bagi para mahasiswa untuk menggabungkan pengetahuan teoritis mereka dengan pengalaman praktis dalam dunia nyata.Selama program magang, peserta akan terlibat dalam berbagai kegiatan yang bertujuan untuk memberikan pemahaman mendalam tentang hukum bisnis dan aplikasinya dalam UMKM kelapa jelly. Beberapa aktivitas yang mungkin dilakukan dalam magang ini antara lain:Penelitian Hukum: Peserta akan melakukan penelitian hukum terkait regulasi dan kebijakan yang berlaku untuk UMKM di sektor makanan dan minuman, khususnya produk kelapa jelly. Mereka akan mempelajari berbagai peraturan terkait seperti perizinan usaha, persyaratan sanitasi, labelisasi produk, dan hak kekayaan intelektual.Konsultasi Hukum: Peserta akan terlibat dalam memberikan konsultasi hukum kepada pemilik UMKM kelapa jelly terkait dengan permasalahan yang mungkin mereka hadapi dalam menjalankan bisnis mereka. Hal ini dapat mencakup masalah kontrak, penyelesaian sengketa, perlindungan merek, dan hal-hal terkait lainnya.Pembuatan Dokumen Hukum: Peserta akan belajar untuk menyusun dokumen hukum yang diperlukan oleh UMKM kelapa jelly, seperti perjanjian kerjasama, perjanjian distribusi, dan perjanjian sewa menyewa.Observasi Langsung: Peserta akan melakukan kunjungan langsung ke UMKM kelapa jelly untuk mengamati proses produksi, distribusi, dan pemasaran produk mereka. Mereka akan memperoleh pemahaman praktis tentang bagaimana hukum bisnis diterapkan dalam kegiatan sehari-hari UMKM tersebut.Pelatihan dan Seminar: Peserta akan memiliki kesempatan untuk mengikuti pelatihan dan seminar yang diselenggarakan oleh pakar hukum bisnis dan praktisi industri. Mereka akan mendapatkan wawasan tambahan tentang tren terbaru dalam hukum bisnis dan praktik terbaik dalam mendukung pertumbuhan UMKM.

name: KOL Specialist Intern
description:
KOL Specialist Intern (PAID-INTERNSHIP) Responsibilities: - Identify potential KOLs aligned with Domma's brand values and target audience. - Develop and maintain a database of KOL contacts, including their areas of expertise, reach, and engagement metrics. - Assist in crafting and executing KOL engagement strategies to enhance brand visibility and credibility. - Coordinate communication and collaboration efforts between KOLs and internal teams to ensure seamless partnerships. - Monitor KOL activities and campaign performance, providing insights and recommendations for optimization. - Support the planning and execution of KOL events, activations, and content partnerships. - Stay informed about industry trends and emerging influencer marketing opportunities. Qualifications: - Currently pursuing a Bachelor's or Master's degree in Marketing, Communications, Business Administration, or a related field. - Passion for influencer marketing, social media, and digital trends. - Strong communication skills, both written and verbal, with a keen eye for detail. - Ability to multitask, prioritize tasks, and thrive in a fast-paced environment. - Familiarity with social media platforms, analytics tools, and content creation trends. - Previous experience in influencer marketing, content creation, or event planning is a plus. - Creative thinker with a proactive attitude and willingness to learn.
 
 Duration: 3 months

name: Assessment Psychometric Internship
description: Job Description: Assist in the coordination of assessment projects, including timeline management, resource allocation, and task tracking. Handle data related to assessment processes, ensuring data accuracy and integrity. Perform data analysis to support project goals. Assist in the preparation of assessment reports, including data visualization and interpretation for various stakeholders. Ensure the quality and consistency of assessment materials and processes through rigorous review and adherence to psychometric standards. Maintain comprehensive project documentation, including project plans, progress reports, and technical documents. Identify and address project-related challenges, applying critical thinking and proposing solutions. Requirements: Currently pursuing or recently completed a Bachelor's degree in Psychology, Statistics, or a related field. Strong research skills with knowledge of psychometric principles and practices. Data Analysis: Proficiency in statistical analysis and data interpretation using software such as SPSS, JASP, Jamovi or similar tools. Ability to apply critical thinking and problem-solving skills to assess and improve assessment instruments. Strong attention to detail when working with assessment data and test development. name: Training Operations Intern
description: Overview: We are seeking a highly motivated and enthusiastic Training Operations Intern to join our dynamic team. As a Training Operations Intern, you will play a crucial role in supporting the training department in planning, coordinating, and executing training programs and initiatives. This internship offers a valuable opportunity to gain hands-on experience in training operations, project management, and organizational development within a fast-paced and collaborative environment. Responsibilities: 1. Assist in Training Program Development: Collaborate with the training team to design and develop training materials, resources, and activities for various programs. This may include creating presentations, handouts, quizzes, and multimedia content. 2. Coordinate Training Logistics: Support the logistical aspects of training sessions, including scheduling, room booking, and ensuring all necessary training materials are available and prepared. 3. Participant Management: Assist with the registration process for training events, manage participant lists, and handle communication with participants regarding training logistics and details. 4. Training Evaluation: Help in collecting and analyzing feedback from participants after training sessions to assess the effectiveness of the programs and identify areas for improvement. 5. Training Program Support: Provide administrative support for various training initiatives, such as coordinating training calendars, maintaining training records, and managing training resources. 6. Continuous Improvement: Contribute to the continuous improvement of training processes and procedures, suggesting innovative ideas to enhance the overall training experience. Requirements: Current enrollment in a relevant degree program (e.g., Management, Education, Business Administration, or related fields). Strong organizational and time-management skills, with the ability to manage multiple tasks simultaneously. Excellent communication skills, both written and verbal. Proficiency in Microsoft Office Suite (Word, Excel, PowerPoint). Detail-oriented and committed to delivering high-quality work. Self-motivated, proactive, and able to work both independently and as part of a team. Interest in training and talent development. Duration: This internship position is expected to last for minimum 3 months, with the possibility of extension based on performance and business needs.

name: Accounting Internship
description: PT. Forecastle Indonesia, was founded in 2009 in Jakarta-Indonesia, with interest and activities encompassing as Shipping Agency, Project Management, Port Agency and Freight Management. We offer our clients a seamless portfolio of support services from the initial planning and budgetary phase to the final delivery. Forecastle also values it’s employee and has the best understanding in the business, translating into employee loyalty, stability and commitment to our client's needs. Visions: To be Love & Respected by all our stake holders, including employees, customers, principals, vendors and shareholders. Missions: To unlock the potential of our employees, to improve the quality of their life. Building values-driven organizations. Focus on Innovation & Best practices. To deliver a great experience. Values: Honesty, Integrity and Professionalism. Family, friendship and enjoying life Hard work, dedication and achievement We are currently hiring Accounting Internship! Job Requirements: SMK Majoring in Accounting or Bachelor Degree in Accounting Minimum < 1 year experience in as an Accounting Intern High speed and high attention to detail and accuracy. Required skills accounting standard and tax regulation, finance management, balance sheet analysis, accounting and financial analysis, general accounting. Initiative, proactive and dynamic person. Having experience using finance accounting system and Microsoft Excel Trustworthy, committed and reliable, able to work independently, and as a team whenever needed, initiative, proactive and dynamic person and capable to perform multitasking work. Fluent in English passive and active (oral & in writing). Strong communication skill for internal and external purpose. Willing to be placed in Jakarta Utara (Tanjung Priok) Responsibilities: Preparing and executing administration related to bank Accurate in payments and familiar with e-banking process Manage the submission billing to Clients or Customers Able to manage work priority on timely basis Provide accurate and timely financial report. Reconcile accounting data with Holding Company.

name: Purchasing Internship
description: Responsibilities: Assist in sourcing and procuring medical devices from suppliers, ensuring timely delivery and compliance with quality standards. Collaborate with cross-functional teams to understand the demand for various medical devices and support the procurement planning process. Participate in negotiations with suppliers to secure favourable terms, pricing, and contracts. Conduct market research to identify potential suppliers, assess product quality, and stay informed about industry trends. Work closely with the Purchasing team to maintain accurate records of inventory levels, orders, and supplier performance. Assist in the resolution of any issues related to product quality, delivery delays, or discrepancies with suppliers. Requirements: Currently pursuing a bachelor's degree or fresh graduate in Business, Supply Chain Management, or a related field. Strong analytical and problem-solving skills with a keen attention to detail. Excellent communication and interpersonal skills to effectively collaborate with team members and external suppliers. Proficient in Microsoft Office Suite, particularly Excel and PowerPoint. Eagerness to learn and adapt in a fast-paced environment within the medical devices industry. Ability to prioritize tasks, meet deadlines, and manage multiple assignments simultaneously. Understanding of basic procurement concepts and willingness to develop expertise in medical devices procurement.

name: Field Market Intern
description: Join Our Team as Field Market Intern! Are you a dynamic and self-motivated individual with a passion for sustainable solutions? noovoleum is on the lookout for a talented Field Market Intern to promote environmental sustainability solutions. Role Overview As the Field Market Intern, you'll be the mastermind behind building and thriving noovoleum communities. Your efforts will directly contribute to our mission of promoting environmental sustainability. Key Responsibilities: Act as a passionate and knowledgeable advocate for our company within your community. Initiate and lead engaging discussions to educate individuals about the benefits of recycling used cooking oil. Foster meaningful relationships with community members, local organizations, and influencers to promote noovoleum mission. Provide hands-on assistance and support to users, ensuring they have a seamless experience and can fully maximize their recycling efforts. Collaborate with local businesses, schools, and community centres to establish partnerships Organize and participate in promotional events, workshops, and campaigns to drive awareness and adoption of our solutions. Gather feedback, suggestions, and insights from the community to help improve the UCOllect app and user experience. Requirements: Proven experience as SPG (Sales Promotion Girl/Boy) or similar experience with a track record of driving results. Passion for sustainability and environmental responsibility. Ability to thrive in a dynamic and fast-paced work environment. Ability to be mobile and to travel for work. Based in Bandung (WFO) apart from work trips. Able to speak English is a plus. What We Offer: Competitive salary. Opportunity to make a meaningful impact on environmental sustainability. Collaborative and innovative work culture. Room for professional growth and development. Opportunity to create meaningful experiences!

name: Temporary Product & Partnerships Coordinator (Interns Welcomed)
description:
Company Overview: PT. Solusi Nutri Sehat, the visionary force behind "Made Good Market," "Vege Vibes," and the recently rejuvenated "Potami," is at the forefront of the health food industry in Indonesia. Our commitment to promoting a healthier lifestyle through innovative and sustainable food products has set us apart in the market. As we continue to expand our product portfolio and enhance our market presence, we are looking for a Temporary Product & Partnerships Coordinator to ensure continuity and growth during our valued team member's maternity leave. Role Overview: The Temporary Product & Partnerships Coordinator will be instrumental in managing our diverse product portfolio, including the introduction of new SKUs, and developing strategic partnerships that align with our vision for health and sustainability. This role is ideal for a proactive individual with strong negotiation skills and a keen understanding of the health food industry. Key Responsibilities: Product Portfolio Management: Efficiently manage the introduction of new SKUs, coordinating with internal teams and external suppliers to ensure a seamless onboarding process. Partnership Development: Negotiate favorable terms with partners, focusing on pricing, payment terms, MOQ, and other key agreements to support our in-house product lines. Strategic Collaborations: Foster relationships with event organizers, advertisers, and other third parties to establish collaborations and sponsorships that enhance our brand visibility and market reach.
  Qualifications: Experience in product management or partnership development, preferably in the health food or FMCG sectors. Strong negotiation, communication, and interpersonal skills. Ability to work autonomously and in a team environment. Detail-oriented, with excellent organizational and project management skills. What We Offer: A chance to be part of a leading company in the health food industry. Competitive salary for the 4-month period. A dynamic and supportive work culture. Potential for contract extension based on satisfactory performance.

Intern ini bersifat voluntary (SUKARELA) dengan benefit mendapatkan sertifikat selesai magang, data-data kebutuhan penelitian (sesuai perjanjian dengan perusahaan), penilaian untuk kebutuhan Kerja Praktek (KP) setelah program magang dilakukan dan berakhir dengan baik. 2. Pekerjaan ini merupakan bagian dari Program Pengabdian Kepada Masyarakat oleh PT MEDIKA NUSANTARA GUMILANG dan dibuka untuk seluruh mahasiswa dari manapun berada dan pekerjaan yang dilakukan ONLINE (WFH) dengan kemampuan harus dapat berbahasa Indonesia dengan baik. Requirements: 1. Preferably Communication / Marketing / Public Relation / International Relation Major 2. Diutamakan fresh gradu 3. Have internet network access, personal laptop and personal smartphone 4. Willing to commit to doing this internship voluntarily for 3-6 months 5. Unpaid Internship 6. Remote internship (full wfh): mon to fri 09.00� -� 16.00� WIB Responsibilities: Provide high level customer service and maintain strong customer relations Follow-up customer experience and manage existing customers to ensure long-term engagement Understand client requirements & objectives and provide feasible solutions Work closely with Customer Relationship Management (CRM) Team Keep track of the CRM performance and identify points of improvements What we are looking for: 1. Strong customer service and communication skills 2. Highly motivated individual and proactive with a positive attitude 3. Detail oriented, analytical, and highly organized 4. Excellent problem solving skills 5. Have a passion for digital marketing is a plus 6. Good communication in Bahasa (verbal and written) are preferred. English would be an advantage

name: Desainer Grafis & Brand (Internship)
description: Job Descriptions Membuat karya desain yang menarik dengan kreatifitas, konsep dan strategi yang kuat,dan dikerjakan sesuai dengan timeline yang telah ditentukan. Berperan serta aktif dalam membantu pekerjaan team kreatif baik dalam proses creative thinking dan creative design. Mengobservasi kegiatan kerja pada lingkungan Brandkraft, seperti bagaimana proses kerja dalam tim kreatif. Dapat memahami Client’s Brief dengan baik, dan memiliki pemikiran analitis terhadap kegiatan usaha klien, produk dan servis yang dimilikinya, target konsumen, dan bagaimana hal-hal ini mempengaruhi dalam pembuatan brand dan desain. Dapat bekerjasama dan berkolaborasi dengan tim untuk menghasilkan karya terbaik dan memenuhi Client’s Brief. Memiliki motivasi - proactive dalam mengembangkan keterampilan dan kemampuan design. Membuat Laporan harian yang isinya menjelaskan pekerjaan yang dikerjakan hari ini dan diserahkan de Design Director dan HR pada akhir jam kerja. Memberikan performa terbaik dalam bekerja, khususnya dalam: Creativity, Problem-solving, Attention to detail, Time Management, and Multi-tasking. Job Requirements menguasai adobe illustrator, photoshop, indesign. menguasai basic design grafis, layout, typography, warna, ect, memiliki passion pada bidang branding and packaging design diutamakan yang berkuliah di Jurusan Design Creative Visual

name: Finance Accounting Intern
description: Company Description: PT. AMANAH KARYA INDONESIA is an IT Solution and Software Development company based in Depok. We provide the latest innovative business solutions profit-oriented for our clients. Our applications and websites run on various programming languages, including PHP, ASP.Net, YII, Joomla, Wordpress, and others. Our products include Bisatopup.co.id and Mutasibank.co.id. Role Description: This is an internship role for a Finance Accounting Intern. The intern will assist with day-to-day financial and accounting tasks, including maintaining financial records, preparing financial statements, and verifying financial data. The intern will work in our Depok office and will have the flexibility to work from home when necessary. The main work that must be done is: Assist the daily activities of Finance & Accounting staff Carry out daily, weekly and monthly recording in the Company Journal Making financial reporting Qualifications: Active students in semester 5 or final year who want to gain work experience Education level D3/D4/S1 majoring in Accounting, Finance, Economics or appropriate Can operate Microsoft Office (Word, Excel and PowerPoint) Familiar with using Spreadsheets Have an understanding of the flow of financial records and financial reports Have a high desire to learn Can work onsite Benefits: Paid Internship Certificate Have the opportunity to become an employee

name: Account Executive Intern
description: Job Description Assist in building and maintaining relationships with clients. Respond to client inquiries and provide relevant information. Collaborate with the team to understand client needs and expectations. Aid in the development and execution of sales strategies. Prepare sales presentations and materials for client meetings. Conduct market research to identify potential clients and industry trends. Manage and update client records in the CRM system. Prepare sales reports and assist in data analysis. Support the team in organizing and attending client meetings. Communicate effectively with team members and clients. Assist in drafting emails, proposals, and other client-facing communications. Qualifications: Currently pursuing a degree in Business, Marketing, or a related field. Excellent verbal and written communication skills. Strong organizational and multitasking abilities. Basic understanding of sales principles and customer service. Ability to work collaboratively within a team environment. Eagerness to learn and contribute to team goals. Ability to adapt to a dynamic and fast-paced work environment.

name: Talent Acquisitions Intern
description: About the Role We are seeking a dynamic and motivated Talent Acquisitions Intern to join our team. This internship offers hands-on experience in various aspects of talent acquisition within a fast-paced and innovative environment. The ideal candidate is passionate about recruiting, has excellent communication skills, and is eager to learn. Responsibilities Assist with sourcing and recruiting efforts by screening resumes, conducting initial interviews, and scheduling interviews. Collaborate with HR Lead to understand job requirements and develop effective job postings. Utilize an applicant tracking system (ATS) to maintain candidate records and track recruitment metrics. Provide administrative support to the HR team, including drafting correspondence and maintaining recruitment documentation. Stay updated on industry trends and best practices in talent acquisition. Requirements Currently pursuing a Bachelor's degree in Human Resources, Business Administration, Psychology, or a related field. Fresh graduates are welcome to apply. Strong interest in talent acquisition and human resources. Excellent verbal and written communication skills. Ability to multitask and prioritize in a fast-paced environment. Proficiency in Microsoft Office Suite (Word, Excel, PowerPoint). Familiarity with applicant tracking systems is a plus. Strong attention to detail and organizational skills. Ability to maintain confidentiality and professionalism.

name: Human Resource & General Affair Internship
description: Imajin is an online manufacturing marketplace in Indonesia, offering a range of services from mold and dies fabrication to parts production and CNC machine rental. With a track record of delivering high-quality and innovative solutions to our clients, we're seeking a driven HRGA Internship to join our team. Responsibilities: Support day-to-day HR operations and administrative tasks. Assist in the recruitment process, including job postings and initial screenings. Contribute to the development and implementation of employee engagement initiatives. Aid in the maintenance of HR records and documentation. Provide general support to the HR team in various projects. Requirements: Currently pursuing a degree or last year student in Human Resources, Business Administration, or related field (preferrably) Strong communication and organizational skills. Proficient in Microsoft Office Suite. Eagerness to learn and contribute to HR functions. Ability to handle sensitive information with confidentiality. Benefits: Paid internship Gain practical experience in HR and General Affairs. Exposure to a dynamic and collaborative manufacture work environment. Opportunity for mentorship and skill development. Additional Informations: Willing to WFO at Green Office Park 6, BSD, Tangerang Work schedule: Monday-Friday (09.00 - 17.00 WIB) Estimated onboarding date: 12-19 Feb 2024 If you're passionate about leveraging your expertise to drive business growth in the manufacturing sector, we invite you to join Imajin, please fill in our application form: bit.ly/ImajinApplicationForm

name: Creative Social Media Specialist (Intern)
description:
AITINDO is seeking a talented and aspiring student to join us as a Creative Social Media Intern. The person will be responsible for assisting us in managing our clients’ brand social media presence, creating and executing social media campaigns, and working with the creative team to generate fresh and engaging content.
  What you'll do: Work alongside the team to create, develop, and execute a monthly plan for social media strategies Assist in daily content production for our & clients’ brand social media Help in handling daily posting & activities, such as managing clients’ interaction with the followers on social media (TikTok, Instagram, or Twitter) Helping the social media team in doing social media impact measurement and present finding as required Brainstorming campaign ideas
  What you'll need: A final year student or recent graduate from a reputable university Great communication skills, both verbal and written. Preferably, having good English skill Have a desire to learn and grow themselves Creativity in translating a brief to solid social media content Know about content strategy, content marketing and social media marketing Having copywriting skill is a plus Basic time management skills Keep up with the latest social media trends Only shortlisted candidates will be contacted by our team

Willing to do internship Monday to Friday 8.00 - 16.30 (Work From Office). Can start immediately. Placement: Kawasan Industri Pulogadung, East Jakarta

name: Packing & Fulfillment Intern
description: Kasual is the first modern e-commerce experience in Indonesia that combines daywear functionality with personal customization. Kasual is a fun and exciting place to work, a next-gen DNVB company disrupting the fashion and digital industry through beautiful design, innovative features, and a business model that allows us to offer better alternatives to customers than traditional retails. About The Role: As a Packing & Fulfillment Intern, you will play a pivotal role in supporting our operations by ensuring accurate and timely packaging of products, managing inventory, and assisting in the fulfillment process. This internship offers hands-on experience in a dynamic environment, providing insight into logistics, inventory management, and the fulfillment cycle. What You Will Do: Responsible for accurately and efficiently packaging products according to company standards and guidelines. Collaborate with operation team and expedition vendor to pick, pack, and ship orders in a timely manner to meet customer expectations. Ensure that all packaged items meet quality standards and report any discrepancies or issues promptly. Identify opportunities to enhance packaging and fulfillment processes for increased efficiency and cost-effectiveness. Maintain accurate records of inventory levels, packaging materials used, and completed orders. Requirements: Preferably Final Year or Diploma or Bachelor’s Degree with a specialization in Industrial Engineering, Business Administration, Management, Logistics, Supply Chain, or similar technical field of study with relevant practical experience Vocational high school graduate are welcome to apply Strong communication skills, time-management and negotiation abilities Knowledge of supplies, equipment, and/or services ordering Database management skills Ability to analyze and solve problems Ability to prepare routine administrative paperwork Ability to receive, stock, and/or deliver goods Clerical, word processing, and/or office skills Comfortable working in a highly collaborative environment, ability to work in a team and proactively Willing to WFO in Mampang Prapatan, Jakarta Selatan for 6 months internship program and ready to join as soon as possible!

name: Admin Procurement Staff Intern
description: Are you a proactive and detail-oriented individual looking to kick-start your career in the automotive industry? Join to Autopedia as an Admin Procurement Staff Intern at the Head Office. This internship opportunity is perfect for students or recent graduates with a keen interest in procurement and administration. Responsibilities: - Provide administrative support to the procurement team. - Assist in document management and data entry tasks. - Coordinate with vendors and internal stakeholders. - Contribute to the maintenance of procurement records. Qualifications: - Currently pursuing a degree or recent graduate (management & finance related degree). - Have internship Experience preferably - Strong organizational and multitasking abilities. - Proficient in Microsoft Office applications. - Excellent communication and interpersonal skills.

name: Sales Lead Generation
description: Vascomm Internship Program It never too early to start. Gain first-hand working experience at expanding IT company by joining our internship program as a college student or fresh graduate. For those who want to learn and hungry for a challenge, we offer you to feel the unparalleled on-the-job learning opportunity & room for innovation in our Product Team! Responsibility: 1. Identify potential leads and target markets 2. Collect and analyze data on potential customers, industry trends, and competitors. 3. Verify and update contact information for leads. 4. Initiate contact with potential leads through various channels such as email, phone calls, or social media. 5. Develop and maintain relationships with potential customers. 7. Work closely with the marketing team to align lead generation strategies with overall marketing goals. Requirement A final year student or bachelor's degree in business, marketing, sales, or a related field is preferred. Have passion for sales and customer satisfaction. Strong written and verbal communication skills. Customer and Detail-oriented. Have good organizational skills. Willing to learn and open to feedback to grow in their role. Able to commit to a 3-month period of internship program. Benefits: Commission Career opportunities Certificate Learning and development Remote working experienced

name: content videografer & editor

Requirements: Based in Surabaya or Sidoarjo Have basic knowledge of Videography Has experience in video editing and Interested in Commercial Video Work Familiarity with video editing software and the ability to perform basic editing tasks Creativity and Attention to Detail Iphone User is a plus Benefits: Commission Certificate Career Opportunities Remote Working Experienced

name: HR Intern/Trainee - Boyolali
description: Anda memiliki interpersonal skill yang baik, mampu bekerja secara mobile, aktif dalam media sosial yang beragam? Dan Anda mau mendapatkan pengalaman internship berbayar di bidang Human Resource? PT Cilia adalah perusahaan manufaktur terspesialisasi di bidang kantongan plastik yang mempunyai visi untuk menjadi MARKET LEADER di Indonesia. Di PT Cilia, kami percaya bahwa suasana kerja yang PROFESIONAL dapat menghasilkan pekerjaan yang paling MAKSIMAL. Tanggung jawab: Memperluas jaringan secara online dan offline untuk mengisi posisi yang dibutuhkan perusahaan. Membantu menyortir CV kandidat yang melamar sesuai dengan kriteria yang ditetapkan perusahaan. Membuat laporan harian mengenai hasil sourcing calon karyawan. Kualifikasi: Pendidikan D3/S1. Aktif berorganisasi. Terampil dalam berkomunikasi. Memiliki networking yang luas dan beragam. Mampu menggunakan Excel, Zoom dan LinkedIn. Benefit: Gaji berdasarkan jumlah pelamar yang sesuai dengan kebutuhan perusahaan. Kesempatan untuk diangkat menjadi karyawan full time. Jenjang karir. Surat referensi dari HR Manager berdasarkan performa. Tentang perusahaan: PT Cilia adalah perusahaan yang bergerak di bidang kantongan plastik yang mempunyai visi untuk menjadi MARKET LEADER di industri kantongan plastik di Indonesia. Dengan kualitas produk yang konsisten, pelayanan yang optimal dan harga yang kompetitif, PT Cilia telah menjadi salah satu perusahaan kantong plastik ternama di Indonesia dengan beberapa cabang pabrik yang tersebar di pulau Jawa. PT Cilia berdedikasi untuk menjaga kepuasan pelanggan kami di seluruh Indonesia. Dengan itu, kami mengajak Anda yang kompeten untuk bergabung dengan team kami.

name: Brand Community Intern

name: Finance Intern
description: Hybrid Working System Qiscus is a multichannel conversational platform which helps businesses embrace the new expectations of excellent Customer Experience (CX) through the ability to engage in timely conversations at scale. The finance position will play a critical role to ensure overall financial related functions and its procedures are well-tracked and highly organized. We require a person who is highly passionate in finance and accounting with a keen eye for detail to work closely with our high-performing teams. If you find yourself fitting this role, come join us! What You Will Do: Assisting in the preparation of financial statements. Helping to prepare the documents related to the audit. Supporting in finance document filling such as monthly budget and cost reports. Supporting finance team for checking and maintaining documents for business-related transactions. Supporting ad hoc projects of the finance team. Continuously suggest and execute process improvements. What You Will Bring to the Role: Fresh graduates, or at least 3rd year undergraduates, preferably majoring in Business, Finance or Accounting. Solid knowledge of financial and accounting procedures. Possess a deep interest in finance in the tech startup industry. Excellent analytical and numerical skills. Strong ethics with an ability to manage confidential data Eager to learn, organized, detail oriented and have a can-do attitude.

name: Content Creator Intern
description: Company Description We are ARC Global Network. We’re a small-medium creative agency established in 2021 and has since been growing steadily. We specialize in providing creative, digital, and marketing services and as per now we manage to handle 30+ clients from Indonesia and abroad. Responsibilities Collaborate with the planning team to brainstorm and develop innovative ideas and strategies for marketing campaigns. Assist in the creation of engaging content for various communication channels, including social media platforms. Conduct research on industry trends, consumer behavior, and competitor strategies to inform planning decisions. Support the team in preparing presentations, reports, and other materials for client meetings and internal discussions. Engage actively in team meetings and contribute ideas and insights to ongoing projects. Monitor and analyze the performance of campaigns and provide recommendations for optimization. Maintain open communication channels with team members and stakeholders, both verbally and in writing. Requirements: Enrolled as an undergraduate student majoring in Mass/Marketing Communication or a related field. Strong creativity and ability to generate original ideas for marketing campaigns. Fluency in both English and Bahasa, with excellent writing and verbal communication skills. Youthful spirit with a keen interest in staying updated with current trends and pop culture. Familiarity with various social media platforms and understanding of their usage in marketing. Self-driven individual with a positive attitude and ability to work effectively in a team. Detail-oriented approach to tasks and projects, with a commitment to delivering high-quality work. Good interpersonal skills and ability to build relationships with colleagues and clients. Fresh Graduate / College student can apply.

Able to translate design brief to visual outcome. Creative and high attention to details. Fluent in English both spoken and written. Good in time management and workload. Able to work in individual and team. Willing to be placed in our office location in Pancoran, South Jakarta.

name: Training Operations Intern
description: Overview: We are seeking a highly motivated and enthusiastic Training Operations Intern to join our dynamic team. As a Training Operations Intern, you will play a crucial role in supporting the training department in planning, coordinating, and executing training programs and initiatives. This internship offers a valuable opportunity to gain hands-on experience in training operations, project management, and organizational development within a fast-paced and collaborative environment. Responsibilities: 1. Assist in Training Program Development: Collaborate with the training team to design and develop training materials, resources, and activities for various programs. This may include creating presentations, handouts, quizzes, and multimedia content. 2. Coordinate Training Logistics: Support the logistical aspects of training sessions, including scheduling, room booking, and ensuring all necessary training materials are available and prepared. 3. Participant Management: Assist with the registration process for training events, manage participant lists, and handle communication with participants regarding training logistics and details. 4. Training Evaluation: Help in collecting and analyzing feedback from participants after training sessions to assess the effectiveness of the programs and identify areas for improvement. 5. Training Program Support: Provide administrative support for various training initiatives, such as coordinating training calendars, maintaining training records, and managing training resources. 6. Continuous Improvement: Contribute to the continuous improvement of training processes and procedures, suggesting innovative ideas to enhance the overall training experience. Requirements: Current enrollment in a relevant degree program (e.g., Management, Education, Business Administration, or related fields). Strong organizational and time-management skills, with the ability to manage multiple tasks simultaneously. Excellent communication skills, both written and verbal. Proficiency in Microsoft Office Suite (Word, Excel, PowerPoint). Detail-oriented and committed to delivering high-quality work. Self-motivated, proactive, and able to work both independently and as part of a team. Interest in training and talent development. Duration: This internship position is expected to last for minimum 3 months, with the possibility of extension based on performance and business needs.

description: Job Description : As a Frontend Developer, you will be an integral part of our software development team. You will be responsible for translating visual designs and concepts into code that is accessible through web browsers. You will collaborate with design and backend development teams to create engaging and responsive user experiences. name: Sales Intern
description: We are seeking a highly motivated Sales Intern to join our team. The Sales Intern will play a key role in executing our sales strategies and promoting our services. This position offers an excellent opportunity to gain hands-on experience in sales and contribute to the growth of our company. Responsibilities: 1. Brochure Distribution: Distribute brochures at designated locations. Ensure brochures are effectively distributed to maximize reach and visibility. 2. Press Release Submission: Prepare and send press releases to relevant media outlets. Ensure timely submission and follow-up to maximize press coverage. 3. Objective Achievement: Focus on selling Konekios websites to meet sales targets. Develop a deep understanding of Konekios services to effectively communicate value propositions to potential customers. 4. Brand Visibility: Ensure that the company's name remains prominent in all promotional activities. Implement strategies to prevent the company's name from being overshadowed. Qualifications: Strong communication and interpersonal skills. Ability to work independently and as part of a team. Goal-oriented with a strong drive to succeed. Familiarity with sales and marketing concepts is a plus. Willingness to learn and adapt to new challenges. This position offers valuable hands-on experience in sales and marketing, with opportunities for growth and development within our company. If you are passionate about sales and eager to contribute to the success of our team, we encourage you to apply.

Menguasai komputer, Menguasai MS Office Memiliki kemampuan dalam pengolahan data dan analisa data.

name: Temporary Product & Partnerships Coordinator (Interns Welcomed)
description:
Company Overview: PT. Solusi Nutri Sehat, the visionary force behind "Made Good Market," "Vege Vibes," and the recently rejuvenated "Potami," is at the forefront of the health food industry in Indonesia. Our commitment to promoting a healthier lifestyle through innovative and sustainable food products has set us apart in the market. As we continue to expand our product portfolio and enhance our market presence, we are looking for a Temporary Product & Partnerships Coordinator to ensure continuity and growth during our valued team member's maternity leave. Role Overview: The Temporary Product & Partnerships Coordinator will be instrumental in managing our diverse product portfolio, including the introduction of new SKUs, and developing strategic partnerships that align with our vision for health and sustainability. This role is ideal for a proactive individual with strong negotiation skills and a keen understanding of the health food industry. Key Responsibilities: Product Portfolio Management: Efficiently manage the introduction of new SKUs, coordinating with internal teams and external suppliers to ensure a seamless onboarding process. Partnership Development: Negotiate favorable terms with partners, focusing on pricing, payment terms, MOQ, and other key agreements to support our in-house product lines. Strategic Collaborations: Foster relationships with event organizers, advertisers, and other third parties to establish collaborations and sponsorships that enhance our brand visibility and market reach.
  Qualifications: Experience in product management or partnership development, preferably in the health food or FMCG sectors. Strong negotiation, communication, and interpersonal skills. Ability to work autonomously and in a team environment. Detail-oriented, with excellent organizational and project management skills. What We Offer: A chance to be part of a leading company in the health food industry. Competitive salary for the 4-month period. A dynamic and supportive work culture. Potential for contract extension based on satisfactory performance.

name: Field Market Intern
description: Join Our Team as Field Market Intern! Are you a dynamic and self-motivated individual with a passion for sustainable solutions? noovoleum is on the lookout for a talented Field Market Intern to promote environmental sustainability solutions. Role Overview As the Field Market Intern, you'll be the mastermind behind building and thriving noovoleum communities. Your efforts will directly contribute to our mission of promoting environmental sustainability. Key Responsibilities: Act as a passionate and knowledgeable advocate for our company within your community. Initiate and lead engaging discussions to educate individuals about the benefits of recycling used cooking oil. Foster meaningful relationships with community members, local organizations, and influencers to promote noovoleum mission. Provide hands-on assistance and support to users, ensuring they have a seamless experience and can fully maximize their recycling efforts. Collaborate with local businesses, schools, and community centres to establish partnerships Organize and participate in promotional events, workshops, and campaigns to drive awareness and adoption of our solutions. Gather feedback, suggestions, and insights from the community to help improve the UCOllect app and user experience. Requirements: Proven experience as SPG (Sales Promotion Girl/Boy) or similar experience with a track record of driving results. Passion for sustainability and environmental responsibility. Ability to thrive in a dynamic and fast-paced work environment. Ability to be mobile and to travel for work. Based in Bandung (WFO) apart from work trips. Able to speak English is a plus. What We Offer: Competitive salary. Opportunity to make a meaningful impact on environmental sustainability. Collaborative and innovative work culture. Room for professional growth and development. Opportunity to create meaningful experiences!

name: Finance Accounting Intern
description: Company Description: PT. AMANAH KARYA INDONESIA is an IT Solution and Software Development company based in Depok. We provide the latest innovative business solutions profit-oriented for our clients. Our applications and websites run on various programming languages, including PHP, ASP.Net, YII, Joomla, Wordpress, and others. Our products include Bisatopup.co.id and Mutasibank.co.id. Role Description: This is an internship role for a Finance Accounting Intern. The intern will assist with day-to-day financial and accounting tasks, including maintaining financial records, preparing financial statements, and verifying financial data. The intern will work in our Depok office and will have the flexibility to work from home when necessary. The main work that must be done is: Assist the daily activities of Finance & Accounting staff Carry out daily, weekly and monthly recording in the Company Journal Making financial reporting Qualifications: Active students in semester 5 or final year who want to gain work experience Education level D3/D4/S1 majoring in Accounting, Finance, Economics or appropriate Can operate Microsoft Office (Word, Excel and PowerPoint) Familiar with using Spreadsheets Have an understanding of the flow of financial records and financial reports Have a high desire to learn Can work onsite Benefits: Paid Internship Certificate Have the opportunity to become an employee

Qualifications: Currently pursuing a degree in Business, Marketing, or a related field. Excellent verbal and written communication skills. Strong organizational and multitasking abilities. Basic understanding of sales principles and customer service. Ability to work collaboratively within a team environment. Eagerness to learn and contribute to team goals. Ability to adapt to a dynamic and fast-paced work environment.

name: Talent Acquisitions Intern
description: About the Role We are seeking a dynamic and motivated Talent Acquisitions Intern to join our team. This internship offers hands-on experience in various aspects of talent acquisition within a fast-paced and innovative environment. The ideal candidate is passionate about recruiting, has excellent communication skills, and is eager to learn. Responsibilities Assist with sourcing and recruiting efforts by screening resumes, conducting initial interviews, and scheduling interviews. Collaborate with HR Lead to understand job requirements and develop effective job postings. Utilize an applicant tracking system (ATS) to maintain candidate records and track recruitment metrics. Provide administrative support to the HR team, including drafting correspondence and maintaining recruitment documentation. Stay updated on industry trends and best practices in talent acquisition. Requirements Currently pursuing a Bachelor's degree in Human Resources, Business Administration, Psychology, or a related field. Fresh graduates are welcome to apply. Strong interest in talent acquisition and human resources. Excellent verbal and written communication skills. Ability to multitask and prioritize in a fast-paced environment. Proficiency in Microsoft Office Suite (Word, Excel, PowerPoint). Familiarity with applicant tracking systems is a plus. Strong attention to detail and organizational skills. Ability to maintain confidentiality and professionalism.

name: Intern Junior Content Creator
description: Dipstrategy are looking for amazing creators to work in our fast-paced social content team. You will work closely with teams across the business to understand their needs and communications objectives, then translate this into content that appeals directly to our audiences. You’ll create the content, with support from the rest of the creative team, so you’ll need to be full of ideas and always ready to shoot. You’ll need to be fluent in all the main social media channels, and there’s also the opportunity to get involved with other digital channels including websites. Job Description: The ability to create fantastic content is key to this role! Responsibilities include, but are not limited to: Create engaging and shareable content on a regular basis. That includes some combination of Reels, TikTok, video, photos and graphic design. Use basic data to see what works, and continuously improve your output. Stay up-to-date on the latest social trends and features, and incorporate them into your work. Requirements: Proven social media content creation experience. Excellent creative skills. Proven experience in video, photos, graphic design (Minimal with Canva) or Reels/TikTok (Minimal Create with capcut). Strong understanding of algorithms and how to optimize content for maximum reach and engagement. Experience of editing content using a hand phone. Working knowledge of graphic-design programs, including Adobe Photoshop, InDesign and Illustrator, is an advantage. Experience in using digital tool and AI is a plus!

name: Assessment Psychometric Internship
description: Job Description: Assist in the coordination of assessment projects, including timeline management, resource allocation, and task tracking. Handle data related to assessment processes, ensuring data accuracy and integrity. Perform data analysis to support project goals. Assist in the preparation of assessment reports, including data visualization and interpretation for various stakeholders. Ensure the quality and consistency of assessment materials and processes through rigorous review and adherence to psychometric standards. Maintain comprehensive project documentation, including project plans, progress reports, and technical documents. Identify and address project-related challenges, applying critical thinking and proposing solutions. Requirements: Currently pursuing or recently completed a Bachelor's degree in Psychology, Statistics, or a related field. Strong research skills with knowledge of psychometric principles and practices. Data Analysis: Proficiency in statistical analysis and data interpretation using software such as SPSS, JASP, Jamovi or similar tools. Ability to apply critical thinking and problem-solving skills to assess and improve assessment instruments. Strong attention to detail when working with assessment data and test development. Ability to work effectively in a virtual team

 Dokumentasi: Menulis dan mengedit dokumen SOP dengan jelas, ringkas, dan mudah dipahami. Memastikan semua dokumen SOP akurat, lengkap, dan terkini. Mengarsipkan semua dokumen SOP dengan benar. Memantau dan melacak perubahan pada dokumen SOP. 
 Keterampilan dan Kualifikasi: Memiliki pengalaman minimal 1 tahun dalam administrasi atau manajemen dokumen. Memiliki pengetahuan yang baik tentang Standar Operasional Prosedur (SOP). Memiliki kemampuan menulis dan mengedit yang baik. Memiliki kemampuan komunikasi yang baik. Mampu bekerja secara mandiri dan sebagai bagian dari tim. Memiliki kemampuan organisasi dan manajemen waktu yang baik. Memiliki perhatian terhadap detail.

name: Software Development Engineer Internship July-Dec 2024
description:
We are looking for exceptionally smart people with strong development skills and an avid interest in web/mobile development. You should be able to learn quickly and work independently - we'll help you as best as we can, but you must be tenacious and resourceful enough to figure out things you don't know how to do. Your assigned workplace will be our office located in Bandung.ResponsibilitiesBuild features and fix bugs in applications being developed (this would be the main responsibility –interns will be assigned a project to work on and will focus on development of features and fix bugs that are project related)Take part in daily standups and present demos of work done.Assist the senior engineers in building proof-of-concepts to validate assumptions during system architectureAssist senior engineers in writing performance test scripts and investigating and debugging performance bottlenecksLearning OutcomesParticipate in daily stand-up meetings as part of the development team and understand agile development methodologyLearn to write efficient, clean and maintainable code (code reviews are routinely conducted with guidance from senior engineers)Understand what it takes to move from writing code to a system that’s deployed with real-world users – you’ll get a close look at the rigour and detail that goes into code reviews, architecture, performance, security, testing and deployments.Gain experience in applying existing academic knowledge in solving real-world problemsIf you've built something in the past, do let us know. Github and/or StackOverflow profiles are welcome.You'll get to work in a fast-paced environment, with a great team of full-stack engineers who have a lot of experience in building large software applications from scratch.We seek your understanding that only shortlisted candidates will be notified.
Students will be required to commit full time 40 hours per week for at least 6 months.Solid programming ability in at least one languageClear and precise written communication. A large part of our team works remotely and it's vital that you are able to document ideas, progress and problems with clarity so everyone can work asynchronously.You must be happy to work independently (remote welcome) and be able to structure timelines, take ownership and responsibility and communicate clearly. Any experience in the one or more of the following is a definite plus:Worked on non-trivial Javascript applicationsVueJS experienceDevelopment experience in C# or PythonCandidates with outstanding performance may be offered a full-time position upon graduation

name: Senior Business Development Executive
description:
What You'll Do:

Generate and close new business.
Maintain business and relationships with existing customers.
Deliver a consistent and irresistible story to dislodge a customer’s status quo and highlight differentiation.
Be accustomed and comfortable with selling to the IT managers, CxO, decision-makers, and other key leadership roles.
Drive, increase, and accelerate pipeline growth through active demand generation and targeted campaigns.
Pitch to any audience and demonstrate the real customer value proposition of our offering with unparalleled precision.
Quickly translate our offering into a vision that the prospect will perceive as deeply valuable at a personal and corporate level.
Ensure the timely and successful delivery of our solutions according to customer needs and objectives.
Be responsible for keeping current clients satisfied and delivering exceptional service on a day-to-day basis.
Update job knowledge by participating in educational opportunities.
Maintain accurate records, review your sales performance, and aim to achieve monthly, quarterly, or annual targets.

What We're Looking For:
Work Experience Background:

FULLY ON SITE IN JAKARTA PUSAT AREA
5+ years of experience in business development (merchant acquisition), account management, and sales from technology companies (O2O, e-commerce, online marketing, or SaaS).
A problem solver; takes a hands-on approach on problem-solving; highly structured, analytical with strong quantitative skills
Employment in a professional services organization is highly preferred.
Experience in dealing with customers at all levels, including C-levels.

Personal Qualification:

High interpersonal and communications skills; excellent presentation skills.
Excellent English communication skills (written and oral).
Demonstrated ability to work independently, as well as work in teams and a multicultural environment.
Analytical with strategic thinking orientation.
Detail-oriented, quick learner and adaptive, innovative, and able to meet schedules in a high-pressure environment.

name: QA Engineer (Bandung)
description:
We are looking for exceptionally smart people with strong analytical and people management skills. As a QA engineer, you will be designing and implementing tests, debug and making corrective actions. You play a vital role in the company's product development process. You will be responsible for testing the product before launches to ensure that the product is free from errors and reliable. You should be able to learn quickly and work independently - we'll help you as best as we can, but you must be tenacious and resourceful enough to figure out things you don't know how to do.


Review requirements, specifications and technical design documents to provide timely and meaningful feedback
Create detailed, comprehensive and well-structured test plans and test cases
Identify, record, document and track bugs using respective tools by thinking through different permutations of a business scenario
Perform regression testing when bugs are resolved
Work closely with internal teams (e.g. developers and product managers) to identify system requirements
Monitor debugging process results


Available to work FULLY ON SITE in BANDUNG
Diploma/Degree in Computer Science, Infocomm Technology, Computer or Electronics Engineering with excellent academic records or outstanding professional or personal achievement.
Fresh graduates are welcome.
Participated in a full software or product development cycle, preferably using Agile Methodology
Excellent analytical, conceptualisation and problem-solving skills
Excellent verbal and written communication skills with the ability to pitch ideas
Strong influencing and people management skills
Ability of visualizing workflows and translating them into digital mediums e.g. Word, PowerPoint, and Excel
Meticulous and detailed oriented with excellent documentation skills
A driven and motivated personality with aptitude for analysis
Strong and avid interest in web and mobile applications
Being a pro-active, self-motivated and resourceful team member with good tech/digital knowledge
Good English communication skills for interaction with both internal and external stakeholders of all levels


The following would be a “plus”


Prior experience as a QA Engineer in a software delivery project 
Prior experience leading a product development firm or consulting experience
Knowledge or experience in implementing projects in at least one of the following areas - Data Analytics, Agile Methodologies, Cloud, Internet and Mobile Technologies, Customer Relationship Management, Knowledge Management and Service Design


This role would be the precursor to a Business Analyst position to support teams to deliver software while maintaining a close relationship with the Client’s senior stakeholders.

We seek your understanding that only shortlisted candidates will be notified.

name: Application Support Engineer (Fresh Grads/ Entry Level) (Bandung)
description:
We are looking for an Application Support Engineer to join our team - we will work together to maintain and improve mission-critical web and mobile applications for our clients. It is imperative that our software applications continue to be robust, secure and future proof, especially given our portfolio of customers. You will have the opportunity to advance your career to Quality Assurance then to Business Analyst - Project Management. 


Provide application support to resolve reported issues and incidents.
Fulfill service requests and change requests.
Document and track incidents, service requests, change requests and provide regular progress reports.
Coordinate closely with support teams to test and deploy application defect fixes, enhancements and patches to the production environment in accordance with project methodologies.
Coordinate regular system maintenance and upgrade activities such as monthly maintenance and hotfix deployments.
Conduct user requirement analysis for application enhancements. 
Support the team in defining project requirements, tracking and documentation.
Propose improvements to address recurring issues and close monitoring gaps.


Available to work FULLY ON SITE in BANDUNG
Diploma / Bachelor Degree in Information Technology, Computer Science or Computer Engineering with excellent academic records or outstanding professional or personal achievement
At least one year of working experience in software maintenance and support 
Fresh graduates are welcome.
Strong problem-investigation and solving skills
Has an analytical mindset and able to understand business and functional concepts
Proactive and self-driven and able to work under pressure with a high sense of urgency
Possess SQL knowledge and able to construct basic SQL queries
Ability to understand and grasp concepts of users’ interfaces, client-server environment, web technology, operating systems (Unix & Windows), database and middleware
Ability to work effectively both independently & within a team
Good English communication skills for interaction with both internal and external stakeholders of all levels

• Research various destinations and means of travel regarding prices, customs, weather conditions, reviews etc.
• Oversee examining and interpreting traction for the packages using Google analytics
• Work with a special team tasked with re-designing the HalalTrip App which includes UI/UX aspect and designing on FIGMA.
• Proficient in written and spoken English as this is a customer-facing role

name: Asisten Fotografi
description: Pengambilan Foto:Mahasiswa magang akan terlibat dalam pengambilan foto untuk berbagai keperluan, termasuk dokumentasi acara, produk, portofolio, atau proyek khusus. Mereka akan bekerja dengan tim atau klien untuk memahami kebutuhan fotografi dan menghasilkan gambar yang sesuai.Pemrosesan dan Pengeditan Foto:Mahasiswa magang akan belajar untuk memproses dan mengedit foto menggunakan perangkat lunak pengeditan foto. Mereka akan mengembangkan keterampilan dalam retouching, peningkatan warna, penyesuaian kontras, dan manipulasi foto lainnya untuk mencapai hasil yang diinginkan.Penyusunan Proyek Fotografi:Mahasiswa magang akan bekerja pada proyek-proyek fotografi yang ditugaskan, seperti pemotretan editorial, portofolio produk, atau pemotretan acara khusus. Mereka akan merencanakan, mempersiapkan, dan melaksanakan proyek tersebut dengan bimbingan dan arahan dari supervisor atau mentor.Kolaborasi dengan Tim Kreatif:Mahasiswa magang akan berkolaborasi dengan tim kreatif lainnya, seperti desainer grafis, penulis konten, atau manajer pemasaran, untuk menghasilkan konten visual yang koheren dan efektif. Mereka akan berpartisipasi dalam sesi brainstorming, pertemuan strategi, dan koordinasi proyek.Pameran atau Showcase:Mahasiswa magang dapat memiliki kesempatan untuk memamerkan atau menampilkan karya fotografi mereka dalam pameran atau showcase yang diselenggarakan oleh perusahaan atau institusi terkait. Ini akan memberi mereka pengalaman dalam memamerkan karya mereka kepada publik dan mendapatkan umpan balik.Evaluasi dan Umpan Balik:Mahasiswa magang akan menerima umpan balik secara teratur dari supervisor atau mentor tentang kualitas karya fotografi mereka, kemajuan mereka, dan area-area yang perlu ditingkatkan. Mereka akan menggunakan umpan balik ini untuk terus memperbaiki keterampilan mereka dalam fotografi.

Minat mengikuti berita nasional terkini lebih diutamakan.4. Keterampilan komunikasi interpersonal yang baik, pemecahan masalah, dan manajemen diri.5. name: Documentation Centre Assistant Intern
description:
Responsibilities 

Documentation Management: Assist in organizing, cataloging, and maintaining documents, records, and information resources. 

Information Retrieval: Aid in retrieving and disseminating requested documents or data to users. 

Archiving and Classification: Assist in archiving materials, implementing classification systems, and ensuring easy access to resources. 

Database Maintenance: Help in managing digital databases, ensuring accuracy, and updating information regularly. 

Administrative Support: Assist in administrative tasks such as data entry, creating reports, and managing documentation systems. 

Requirements 

Students from any major are welcome to apply. Students majoring in Library Science, Information Management, History, or related programs are prioritized. 

Preferably in the last semester of study with no active classes; or students working on ongoing thesis work. 

Adaptable individuals with high motivation to learn. Candidates have a great organizing skills with attention to detail. 

Min. 3 months of full-time internship and ready to work from the office. 

No compensation will be provided, but great working experience may follow. 

Thank you for applying to The Jakarta Post! Notes: Our company has never levied any fees for the recruitment process nor has it required to order tickets and acc

name: Video Editing

Job description :

 Assembling raw footage in editing software. 

Following a storyboard, script or outline. 

Insert sound to enhance footage, include selecting music, and sound effects.

Ability to operate camera and lighting. 

Report and present a final product that matches storyboard to Supervisor of videography.

Student on last semester from Art/Design/Creative Multimedia, film studies or equivalent. 

Experienced as Video Editor and Cameramen. 

Creative, Innovative, Artistic, Eye for appealing visuals, storytelling, Precision, Collaboration, Time management. 

Hands on experience with editing software, including Adobe After Effects, Adobe Premiere and Adobe Audition CC. 

Ability to work to a tight schedule. 

Available for 12 months full time internship. 

Perform well under deadlines and be detail - oriented
